=== Como se obtuvieron los datos ===
Se ejecuto el script disponible <nowiki>[[attachment:ubuntu-co_stats.py|aqui]]</nowiki>. Requiere <nowiki>[[attachment:BeautifulSoup.py|BeautifulSoup]]</nowiki> y conexion a Internet. Los datos se salvaron en formato HTML y posteriormente fueron importados a OpenOffice, donde se efectuo un piloto de datos. Hoja de calculo disponible <nowiki>[[attachment:ubuntu-co_stats.ods|aqui]]</nowiki>. Para convertir la tabla de html a moinmoin se utilizo este <nowiki>[[http://diberri.dyndns.org/wikipedia/html2wiki/|enlace]]</nowiki>

Se modifico el script y la <nowiki>[[attachment:UbuntuEstadisticasMoinMoin.py|nueva versión]]</nowiki> genera de una ves las estaditicas

=== How this report was created ===
The python script used to generate this report is available <nowiki>[[attachment:ubuntu-co_stats.py|here]]</nowiki>. It requires <nowiki>[[attachment:BeautifulSoup.py|BeautifulSoup]]</nowiki> and a working Internet connection. The data was then saved in HTML format and later imported into OpenOffice.org, where data was again manipulated. The spreadsheet we used is available <nowiki>[[attachment:ubuntu-co_stats.ods|here]]</nowiki>. To convert the html table to moinmoin format we used this <nowiki>[[http://diberri.dyndns.org/wikipedia/html2wiki/|resource]]</nowiki>
